messages.message: Curious when we will see exporting of build/apps and sharing conversations
what kind of export format are you hinting towards here? exporting as JSON/YAML for version control?
Or to share in the community
App sharing is an ongoing project. weâ€™ll have some more solidified release dates in the next several days

@joshbronko - what use case / workflow have you come across so far for sharing conversations? We are actively scoping this project as part of supporting organisations on AI Hub, and any inputs will be quite valuable.

cc: @hannah

I see two use cases, today if we want to share results of a document we processed or tested for a customer we have to show via our screen. Makes it difficult to collaborate especially if teams are trying to find the right prompts to bring into build. The other I could see is for audit/QA purposes. Anytime we have any stateful data we should consider a sharing aspect.
